name: No Surrender The War
description:
Start shooting real enemies not props carrying suitcases. Become a Machine Gunner, and fire millions of bullets on evil.

If you like war games or FPS games, DOWNLOAD this shooting game simulation for FREE now and be one of the first allies to try NEW CONTENT and GUNS on periodic UPDATES.

NoSurrender The War is designed exclusively for mobile phones. Play single-player campaign missions with different modes anytime and anywhere. Biggest, baddest machine guns arsenal on a game ever! Special ops missions with sniper and anti-air guns.

RETRO ARCADE TO MOBILE

NoSurrender The War brings fun and experience of Arcades Classics to mobile platform. NoSurrender delivers shooting fun factor to the broadest markets and introduces new FPS players to the Genre.

VARIOUS MISSIONS and UNIQUE MODES

Nosurrender is full of iconic missions from best war scenes and contains unique modes through the gameplay. Iconic shooting missions are on land, on water and on air with or without special vehicles of your allies.

COMPETITIVE AND SOCIAL PLAY

Use skill and strategy while shooting madly on the enemy to have the highest score and be the best between your friends. Game is has weekly event modes that you can compete with your friends or help your friends on daily bases.

Features:
● Hyper REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
● Hundreds of adventurous MISSIONS: stay tuned for NEW content all the time
● Biggest, Baddest Weapons Ever:Play with biggest Heavy Machine Guns in the world!
● Limited time events: Kill the most enemies and be the best!
● Sniper games? Boring. Start shooting real enemies not props carrying suitcases. Become a Machine Gunner, not a Sniper and fire millions of bullets on evil.

Disclaimer

NoSurrender The War is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep it away from your kids, children and younger boys



Works with: iPhone SE, 6S, 6S Plus, 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, X, XS, XR; iPad Mini 4, 5; iPad Air 2, 3; iPad Pro



NoSurrender The War DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, 6, 6 Plus; iPad Air, Mini 2, 3; iPod Touch
